dateFrom.description: From (inclusive) date (yyyy-MM-dd) or time in Epoch timestamp millis (number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT)

dateTo.description: To (inclusive) date (yyyy-MM-dd) or time in Epoch timestamp millis (number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT)

direction.description: The direction to sort events by (asc or desc)

type.description: The types of events to return
